DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate safety effectiveness Impedance Monitoring Feature St Jude Medical cardiac device .
DOC.brief_title: Detect Fluid Early From Intra-thoracic Impedance Monitoring
DOC.criteria: Must St. Jude Medical ( SJM ) ICD CRTD least 31 day Must episode acute decompensated heart failure ( ADHF ) within past 6 month History kidney disease require hemodialysis Refractory end stage heart failure
